Retina narrow-field bistratified amacrin.PublicationName: Proc R Soc Lond B Biol Sci.
Retina narrow-field bistratified amacrin.Definition: The third type of cell in the wide to field unistratified class of amacrine cell has a distinct dendritic pattern. The mean soma size, 11.4 micrometers, is larger than the other two types range (10.0 to 13.0 micrometers; N
